meanings.sent1: Her unrestrainedness in spending led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: The unrestrainedness of the puppy made it difficult to train.
meanings.sent3: The unrestrainedness of the children at the party was both chaotic and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His unrestrainedness in laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The unrestrainedness of the waterfall was both beautiful and powerful.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unrestrained.
meanings.sent1: The unrestrainedness of her emotions was evident in her tears.
meanings.sent2: His unrestrainedness in speech often got him into trouble.
meanings.sent3: The unrestrainedness of the music filled the room with energy.
meanings.sent4: The unrestrainedness of the wind made the trees sway wildly.
meanings.sent5: The unrestrainedness of her laughter was contagious to everyone around.

meanings.definition: Excessive freedom or lack of inhibition.
meanings.sent1: The unrestrainedness of his actions shocked everyone present.
meanings.sent2: Her unrestrainedness in dancing was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The unrestrainedness of the partygoers led to a night of wild fun.
meanings.sent4: The unrestrainedness of the artist's brush strokes created a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The unrestrainedness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
